thread.title: Just because of the great location

author: ido8all
title: Just because of the great location
text:
I was looking for hotel in good location in Paris for 2 nights I was there and when I came across Des ducs d'anjou I loved the photos so I decided to book it. The ride from the Orly to the hotel was about 30 minutes on uber and cost â‚¬40. The hotel is dog friendly so they got point for that. The location was as great as I thought it was and close to everything by walk+ metro station (chatlet outside of the hotel). Check in (with the guy from Portugal) went smoothly and super friendly!!!!
Two things that disappointed me- the room / hotel didn't look as fresh/new/chic as in the photos. Actually my room was super small.
The other thing was when I went to breakfast everything was almost gone. So when I asked when are they going to refill it I was told 20 minutes, which meant that I was sitting there waiting for the food. Aside to that dinning room was messy and tables were not picked up.
I would probably stay there again because if the location unless I find good deal in hotel in the area.
